This will ensure that he is prepared to start his work and he will be able to enjoy a better production.  His aim is to improve his work, make his land more productive and start sowing vegetables in order to increase his business and his possibilities of improving his financial situation.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies (herbicides, fertilizers and insecticides)

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more dried fish to sell

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a used clothing business in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to buy more stock to sell for her used clothing business.

NWTF is relisting Josephine's business profile in support of her efforts to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more used clothes to sell.

loans.name: Linda

texts.en:
This is Linda, 60, a resident of Silang, Cavite, Philippines. She is married to Merlito, and mother to her children. She, together with her husband, manages their own household while operating the business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.

Linda operates a variety store. In the Philippines, a variety store is basically a small convenience store, which retails groceries, toiletries and beverages piecemeal to the local neighborhood. It is the place to go to buy one sachet of shampoo, a Php5-worth of cooking oil, or an egg. She earns by getting supplies at wholesale prices and selling by the piece. Her store is located adjacent to her house. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of Php 500 in sales every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a Php 15,000 loan. She will be utilizing the loan to buy groceries, toiletries and beverages to expand her product inventory. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business. 

Linda hopes to be able to expand soon and to give her children a good and high quality education through all her hard work on her business. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week and draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for grocery items and products needed in her business.

loans.name: Felipe Francisco

texts.es:
Felipe Francisco tiene 46 años de edad vive en Unión Libre tiene dos hijos, vive con la esposa y con los hijos en ventanas provincia de los Ríos.

Es integrante de la VRC EL RECREO, se encuentra ubicada en el sector del recinto San Vicente las lomas, Perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores pecuarias y agrícolas.

Felipe Francisco se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, fréjol. Solicita el crédito para comprar semilla, urea, insecticidas, líquido para la maleza.

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar lo necesario. Las compras lo harán en Ventanas provincia de los Ríos.

El sueño es poder comprar lo necesario para los cultivos. En el tiempo libre le gusta jugar y practicar el deporte.
texts.en:
Felipe Francisco is 46 years old and lives with his common-law wife and two children in Ventanas, in los Ríos province.

He is a member of the 'El Recreo' community bank which is located in San Vicente Las Lomas, in Ventanas canton.  The members of this community bank work in farming and livestock raising.

Felipe Francisco is a farmer who grows corn and beans.  He is requesting this loan to buy seeds, urea, insecticides and liquid weedkiller.  With the help of this loan he will be able to buy everything he needs.  He will make his purchases in Ventanas, in los Ríos province.

Felipe Francisco's dream is to be able to buy what he needs for his crops.  In his free time he enjoys playing and practicing sports.

loans.use: to buy seeds, urea, insecticides and liquid weedkiller

loans.name: Analisa

texts.en:
Analisa is 31 years old and single.

Analisa works hard to provide for her family. She runs a electronic re-loading business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 29,500 loan through NWTF to purchase additional load for her business.

Analisa has borrowed and paid for 14 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the electronic re-loading for five years and also earns an income from farming sugarcane.

Analisa aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase additional load for her phone-reloading business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, detergent and beverages

loans.name: Vivian

texts.en: Vivian is married with three children. Vivian is 41 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is a farmer and manages coconut and banana production to earn a living. She has been doing this for 10 years and every month she earn 4,000 PHP from this work. She has requested a loan of 5,600 PHP to purchase farm chemicals. Vivian became a member of GDMPC in 2011. In the future, Vivian hopes to see her children finish their studies.

loans.use: to purchase farm chemicals.

loans.name: Ercilio

texts.es:
Ercilio tiene 59 años de edad, vive en la linda y maravillosas ciudad de Pucallpa, ciudad ubicada en la selva de nuestro país y la cual se caracteriza por tener una flora y fauna impresionante, se caracteriza además por sus platillos típicos, los cuales son muy deliciosos y sobre todo porque uno puede apreciar lo maravillosos de la naturaleza y puede desconectarse del bullicio de la ciudad. Ercilio es muy alegre y sobre todo trabajador pero cuando dispone de un tiempo libre le gusta disfrutarlo paseando con su familia ya que él es casado y junto a su esposa tiene 3 maravillosos hijos cuyas edades comprenden en 11, 15 y 22 años a quienes ama muchísimo y son su razón de vivir y su motivo para seguir esforzándose cada día para poder darles lo mejor y sean personas de bien. Como buen peruano le gusta mucho la comida típica de nuestro país por ello su platillo favorito es el riquísimo “Tallarín con pollo”. Debido a los pocos recursos económicos de sus padres el solo tuvo estudios secundarios pero le hubiera gustado estudiar Mecánica automotriz.

Con mucho esfuerzo Ercilio trabaja en su negocio de transporte de pasajeros en bote, el trabaja en su negocio desde hace ya varios meses ya que veía la necesidad de los pobladores para transportarse porque solo se puede hacer por el rio, el trabaja en su negocio alrededor de 10 horas diarias y puede atender hasta 45 clientes el día; el cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy amable con los clientes y sobre todo porque siempre tiene mucho cuidado cuando transporta a los pasajeros.

Ercilio está muy agradecido y feliz con la ayuda que le han brindado los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comparar un nuevo bote ya que el que tiene actualmente se encuentra un poco viejo y sobre todo porque quiere dar una mejor atención a sus clientes y más seguridad, así de esta manera el podrá transportar a sus clientes de manera muy segura y podrá mejorar sus ingresos y sobre podrá seguir luchando para hacer realidad sus más grande sueño:” “Darle una profesión a sus hijos y que sientan mucho orgullo por él”.
texts.en:
Ercilio is 59 years old. He lives in the beautiful and wonderful city of Pucallpa, a city located in the forests of our nation and which is characterized by its amazing flora and fauna, its traditional dishes which are very delicious and above all because there one can appreciate the wonders of nature and escape from the bustle of the city.

Ercilio is very happy and above all hard working but when he has free  time he likes to enjoy spending it with his family since he is married and he and his wife have three wonderful children who are 11, 15 and 22 years old and whom he loves very much, are his reason to live and his motive to continue working hard each day to be able to give them the best and make then into good people. Like any good Peruvian he likes our national cuisine very much.  His favorite dish is the delicious “Tallarín con pollo” (A chicken noodle dish). He only completed his secondary education since his family did not have many financial resources. However he would have liked to study car mechanics. 

With a lot of hard work, Ercilio works in his boat transport business. He has worked in this business for many months now since he saw that the settlers would need transport, and the only way is by the river. He works in his business around 10 hours a day and can service up to 45 customers a day. He believes that his business is going well because he is very friendly with the customers and above all is very careful when transporting passengers. 
Ercilio is very grateful and happy with the help that the Kiva lenders have given him as thanks to their help he will be able to buy a new boat since the boat he has now is a bit old and above all because he wants to provide his customers with a better service and more security. In this way he will be able to transport his customers in a very safe manner and will be able to improve his income and continue fighting to make his greatest dream come true “to be able to provide his children with a profession and for them to be very proud of him.”

loans.use: to buy a boat

loans.name: Berta De La Concepcion

texts.es: Berta de la concepcion, casada de 63 años de edad,  con tres hijos mayores, tiene por actividad economica  una pulperia ubicada en su casa de habitacion , esta emprendedora incio con esta herramienta hace muchos años por la necesita que tenia de tener un ingresos para su familia, en la actualidad sigue luchado por el pan de cada dia junto a su negocio el cual le ha sido rentable por mucho años, el financiamiento lo esta solicitando para invertir en productos de consumo diario como:  frijoles, azucar, pan, leche de vaca, leche de bolsas, jugos naturales, gaseosas,  caramelos, churritos, entre otros.
texts.en: Berta de la Concepción is 63 years old, married and has three grown-up children.  Her business is a grocery store which is located in her home.  This entrepreneur started her business a long time ago because she needed to make income for her family.  She continues working hard in her business, which has been profitable for many years, to provide for herself on a daily basis.  She is requesting this loan to invest in buying basic household products such as beans, sugar, bread, cows' milk, powdered milk, natural juices, soda, candies, churritos, etc.

loans.use: to buy beans, sugar, bread, cows' milk, powdered milk, natural juices, soda, candies, churritos, etc.

loans.name: Katlyn

texts.en:
This is Katlyn. She previously accessed a Php10,000 loan that she used to purchase more quantities and varieties of grocery items and products needed in her business. Her earnings were a big help for the education of her child and in their personal, household and business expenditures. 

She would like to apply for a Php15,000 loan to buy groceries, toiletries, beverages and other products to add to her inventory. The more items displayed at the store the better. More items to sell will result for better profit. Her profits from business will definitely help her to cover her daily needs and educational expenses of her child. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart. 


Katlyn hopes to be able to expand soon. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week and draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items and products needed in her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy tools and pay for gasoline

loans.name: Basilisa

texts.en:
Basilisa is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a business buying and selling rice in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 29,500 through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of rice to sell. She has been in this business for 12 years. Basilisa earns more income from farming sugarcane and retailing rice grains.

Basilisa has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: To purchase additional sacks of rice to sell

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a tailoring business in the Philippines.  She is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to buy fabrics and equipment for her sewing machine.  She has been in this business for five years. Marilyn earns more income from selling jewelry.

Marilyn has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy fabrics and equipment for her sewing machine.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en: Gloria is married with three children. She is 48 years old and lives in Yahong, Tudela, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. Gloria owns and operates a plot of farmland, planting bananas to earn a living. She has been in this business for 11 years and earns PHP 3,000 each month. She requested a loan of PHP 3,100 to pay for banana planting. Gloria became a member of Kiva's partner, GDMPC, in 2011. In the future, Gloria's plan is to save her returns in order to buy a house.

loans.use: to pay for banana planting

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy materials for repairing shoes such as adhesive, leather, soles, insoles, etc.

loans.name: Imelda Del Carmen

texts.es:
Imelda, se dedica a la venta de pupusas, tiene 39 años de edad, vive con sus tres hijos, de 12, 15 y 18 años de edad, todos estudian, su esposo le ayuda económicamente con las obligaciones del hogar; Ella tiene 5 años en el negocio, trabaja de lunes a domingo, lo aprendió de sus padres, realizándolo como una fuente de ingreso familiar.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de materiales como leña, maíz, aceite, harina de arroz, entre otros productos que sean necesarios para continuar en la producción de las pupusas, esta compra le ayudara a mejorar la capacidad del negocio, a través del préstamo estará generando una condición más estable.
Su aspiración es fortalecer el negocio, ofrecer mejor calidad a sus clientes y que sus hijos puedan contar con una calidad de vida mejor.
texts.en:
Imelda's business is selling pupusas.  She is 39 years old and lives with her three children, aged 12, 15 and 18, who are all in school.  Her husband helps out with the household expenses.

Imelda has been in her business for five years.  She works from Monday to Sunday.  She learned the business from her parents and it is a source of family income.  

Imelda is requesting a loan to buy materials such as firewood, corn, oil, rice flour and other products that she needs in order to continue making her pupusas.  This purchase will help her to improve the capacity of her business and stabilize her situation.

Imelda's aspirations are to strengthen her business, to offer better quality to her customers, and for her children to enjoy a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy materials such as firewood, corn, oil and rice flour

loans.name: Angela Juana

texts.es: Angela Juana de 35 años de edad , casado, del domicilio de leon, tiene por actividad economica la venta de pulperia ubicada en su casa de habitacion experiencia con la cuenta de hace varios años, Angela ya ha tenido credito con leon 2000 y ha demostrado responsblidad, honrades, solvencia moral,  los financiamiento le han sido de mucha ayuda para el cremiento economico de su negocio ya que ha podido invertir en capital de trabajo, el prestamo lo esta solicitando para la compra de productos del consumo diario como: aceite, arroz, frijoles, azucar, huevo, leche, pan, tortas dulces, condimentos, hielo, leña entre otros.
texts.en:
Angela Juana is 35 years old, married and lives in Leon.  Her business is a grocery store which is located in her home.  She has several years experience.  

Angela has already received previous loans from Fundación Leon 2000 and has shown herself to be responsible, honest and of good character.  The loans have been very helpful to her in growing her business as she has been able to invest in working capital.  She has requested this loan to buy basic household products such as oil, rice, beans, sugar, eggs, milk, bread, cakes, seasonings, ice, firewood, etc.

loans.use: to buy oil, rice, beans, sugar, eggs, milk, bread, cakes, seasonings, ice, firewood, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy various lotions for resale.

loans.name: John John

texts.en: John John is 36 years old and lives in the Philippines. He is married with 3 children. John John has a food/retail shop or sari-sari store that buys and sells canned goods, snacks, personal care products, home use products and beverages. Aside from that he also sells charcoal. He has had this business for 6  years. He requested a loan for 8,000 PHP to increase his stock of canned goods, snacks and beverages. John John has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, he hopes to improve his business for the education of his children.

loans.use: to increase his stock of canned goods, snacks, detergents and beverages

loans.name: Ma. Teresa

texts.en:
Ma. Teresa is married with two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Ma. Teresa is 22 years old and has two children who are in school.

Ma. Teresa has a fishing business in the Philippines. Ma. Teresa requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy fishing nets, paint and other equipment to repair her fishing boat.

Ma. Teresa has been in this business for three years. In the future, Ma. Teresa would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets, paint and other equipment to repair her fishing boat.

loans.name: Evelia Del Socorro

texts.es: Evelia del Socorro de 48 años de edad , soltera con un hijo menor de edad, tiene por actividad economica venta de mercaderia en general desde hace vario años que tiene dicha actividad , la cual inico por la necesidad de tener un medio de generar ingresos para la mantencion de su hijo, en la actualidad esta solicitando el prestamo para invertir en mercaderia como: ropa de hombre camisas , pantalones, boxer, calcetines, pañuelos, tuallas, blusas, faldas, medias, juegos de sabanas entre otros.
texts.en: Evelia del Socorro is 48 years old, single and has one dependent child.  Her business is selling general merchandise and she has been in this line of work for some years.  She started her business as she needed to make income in order to support her son.  She is currently requesting this loan to invest in merchandise such as shirts, pants, boxer shorts, socks, scarves, towels, blouses, skirts, pantyhose, sheet sets, etc.

loans.use: to buy shirts, pants, boxer shorts, socks, scarves, towels, blouses, skirts, pantyhose, sheet sets, etc.

loans.name: Maria Marleny

texts.es:
María, vive con sus dos hijos y su esposo, ambos trabajan, ella se dedica a la venta de pupusas los fines de semana junto a su madre, este negocio lo realiza sábados y domingos, tiene ocho años de experiencia. 
Ella solicita un préstamo para invertirlo en los materiales que son necesarios para la producción de las pupusas como chicharrón, aceite, quesillo, maíz, condimentos, entre otros que le ayudaran a mejorar la capacidad del negocio, con este préstamo lograra mejorar el servicio a los clientes.
La aspiración de María es poder crecer en el negocio a través del uso de los préstamos, ser buen cliente para poder lograr su desarrollo comercial con este servicio de financiamiento.
texts.en:
María lives with her husband and two children.  Both she and her husband work. María's business is selling pupusas on a weekend together with her mother.  She works Saturdays and Sundays and has eight years experience.  She is requesting a loan to invest in the materials she needs for making her pupusas such as 'chicharrón' (cooked pork), oil, 'quesillo' (soft cheese), corn, seasonings and other products which will help her to improve the capacity of her business.  This loan will enable her to provide her customers with a better service.

María's goals are to grow in her business by using loans and to be a good client so that she can develop her business through this loan service.

loans.use: to buy cooked pork, oil, soft cheese, corn and seasonings

loans.name: Mbéry

texts.fr:
Madame Mbery  s’active dans la vente de poisson séché. Elle a une expérience de 32 ans car elle a commencé très jeune son commerce. Elle est mariée et mère de famille. Elle n’a jamais bénéficié de crédit c’est sa première fois et elle vient  solliciter un montant  de 200000Fcfa pour acheter et stocker du poisson séché .Car en période  d’hivernage ses condiments ont tendance à être en rupture. Mbery prend en charge ses propres besoin et cela, elle le fait grâce aux bénéfices générés par son activité.
Elle a comme projet futur : d’acquérir un véhicule de transport de marchandises comme cela elle pourra diminuer ses charges d’exploitation, générer  des emplois et maximiser  son profit.
texts.en:
Mrs. Mbery sells dried fish. She has 32 years of experience in this activity having started at a very young age. She is married with children. 

Mbery is seeking a loan for the first time, requesting 200,000CFAF to buy and store dried fish in anticipation for the potential stock shortages of the rainy season. She supports herself with the revenue earned from this activity.

Her goal is to get a transportation vehicle, which would help to reduce her operation costs, create jobs and maximize her profits.

loans.use: to buy dried fish for resale.

loans.name: Violeta

texts.en:
Violeta is from Poblacion 1, Clarin, Misamis Occidental. She is 47 years old, is married, and has four children. Violeta owns and operates a specialized retail store, primarily selling school supplies and food to the local community. She has been engaged in her business for five years and earns 15,000 PHP a month. 

Violeta is requesting a loan of 40,500 PHP which will be used to purchase new items to expand her product offering. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase new items to expand her product offering.

loans.name: Divina

texts.en: Divina is 58 years old and has six children. She is married to a carpenter. Divina earns a living selling local delicacies such as rice cakes and banana cues. She has a monthly income of 4,500 PHP. Divina works hard to increase her sales. She has requested a loan to purchase flour, sugar and other ingredients. This loan will help increase Divina's sales and profitability.

loans.use: to purchase flour, sugar and other ingredients.

loans.name: Abel

texts.en:
Abel is 53 years old from Olkalou. He is married to Elizabeth and they have six children who are all in school.

Abel has a butchery and hotel business that he has been running for the past six years. He has applied for his third loan from KADET Ltd. to enable him to buy food ingredients for his hotel like baking flour, eggs, sugar etc to add to his stock.

He hopes to improve his living standards and be able to educate his children.

loans.use: To buy cooking ingredients.
